thread.title: BRIEF-Caterpillar Latin America Machines Retail Sales For 3-Month Rolling Period Ended Feb. Up 39 Pct

title: BRIEF-Caterpillar Latin America Machines Retail Sales For 3-Month Rolling Period Ended Feb. Up 39 Pct

organizations.name: brief-caterpillar latin america machines retail sa

text: March 13, 2018 / 1:22 PM / Updated 23 minutes ago BRIEF-Caterpillar Latin America Machines Retail Sales For 3-Month Rolling Period Ended Feb. Up 39 Pct Reuters Staff March 13 (Reuters) - Caterpillar Inc: * CATERPILLAR - LATIN AMERICA MACHINES RETAIL SALES FOR 3-MONTH ROLLING PERIOD ENDED FEB. UP 39 PERCENT * CATERPILLAR - WORLD MACHINES RETAIL SALES FOR 3-MONTH ROLLING PERIOD ENDED FEB. UP 33 PERCENT * CATERPILLAR - ASIA/PACIFIC MACHINES RETAIL SALES FOR 3-MONTH ROLLING PERIOD ENDED FEB. UP 41 PERCENT * CATERPILLAR - NORTH AMERICA MACHINES RETAIL SALES FOR 3-MONTH ROLLING PERIOD ENDED FEB. UP 30 PERCENT Source text: ( bit.ly/2tEW0xa ) Further company coverage:
